property.name: query
property.value: select k.uid instance_id, k.document_type_id, ak.document_id from ytex.document d inner join ytex.anno_base ak on ak.document_id = d.document_id inner join ytex.anno_dockey k on ak.anno_base_id = k.anno_base_id where d.analysis_batch = 'cmc-word' order by k.uid, k.document_type_id, ak.document_id

property.name: query
property.value: select k.document_type_id, ak.document_id, ne.anno_base_id, ne.certainty confidence from ytex.document d inner join ytex.anno_base ak on ak.document_id = d.document_id inner join ytex.anno_dockey k on ak.anno_base_id = k.anno_base_id inner join ytex.anno_base ane on ane.document_id = d.document_id inner join anno_named_entity ne on ne.anno_base_id = ane.anno_base_id where d.analysis_batch = 'cmc-word' order by k.document_type_id, ak.document_id

property.name: query
property.value: select distinct ne.anno_base_id, ne.certainty confidence, c.code from ytex.document d inner join ytex.anno_base ak on ak.document_id = d.document_id inner join ytex.anno_dockey k on ak.anno_base_id = k.anno_base_id inner join ytex.anno_base ane on ane.document_id = d.document_id inner join anno_named_entity ne on ne.anno_base_id = ane.anno_base_id inner join anno_ontology_concept c on c.anno_base_id = ne.anno_base_id where d.analysis_batch = 'cmc-word' order by ne.anno_base_id

property.name: query
property.value: select document_type_id, document_id, lower(canonical_form) canonical_form from ( select distinct k.document_type_id, ak.document_id, w.canonical_form from ytex.document d inner join ytex.anno_base ak on ak.document_id = d.document_id inner join ytex.anno_dockey k on ak.anno_base_id = k.anno_base_id inner join ytex.anno_base an on an.document_id = ak.document_id inner join ytex.anno_word_token w on w.anno_base_id = an.anno_base_id left join anno_contain ac on ac.child_anno_base_id = w.anno_base_id and parent_uima_type_id = 8 left join stopword sw on sw.stopword = w.canonical_form where canonical_form is not null and analysis_batch = 'cmc-word' and ac.parent_anno_base_id is null and sw.stopword is null ) s order by document_type_id, document_id
